text: A student shall be able to search study rooms with available seats by campus, date, and time range.

clauses.text: A student shall be able to search study rooms with available seats by campus, date, and time range.

spans.text: by campus, date, and time range

text: When the student is authenticated, the system shall allow reserving one or more seats in a study room for a chosen time slot.

clauses.text: the system shall allow reserving one or more seats in a study room for a chosen time slot.

spans.text: the system shall allow reserving one or more seats in a study room for a chosen time slot.

text: If the selected study room has insufficient available seats for the requested time slot, the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.

clauses.text: If the selected study room has insufficient available seats for the requested time slot, the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.

spans.text: If the selected study room has insufficient available seats for the requested time slot, the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.
If the selected study room has insufficient available seats for the requested time slot, the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.
the system shall reject the reservation
and suggest the nearest available slots

text: A reservation shall include the room identifier, date, start time, end time, and the number of seats requested.

clauses.text: end time, and the number of seats requested

spans.text: end time, and the number of seats requested

text: The system shall prevent a student from booking more than 2 active reservations per day and more than 6 per week.

clauses.text: The system shall prevent a student from booking more than 2 active reservations per day and more than 6 per week.

spans.text: The system shall prevent a student from booking more than 2 active reservations per day and more than 6 per week.
more than 2 active reservations per day
